values:
Now, just a few moments later, I look back on that entry and decide... No... No one should read it.  So, I order no one to read that entry.

It is stupid.  Immature.  And angsty.  So you no read : )

Okay, so, maybe I have a mother, but she means nothing to me.  Somehow, despite the fact that I manage to be the only marginally sane person in this house, I get shoved into therapy.  Which I could deal with.  In fact, I was okay with it, as long as it fit my schedule. 

My appointment was supposed to be for today.  Okay, that's cool, whatever.  I was all prepped and ready to put up with a bitchy therapist, today, but, alas, my appointment was not documented?!  Oh noes!  Way to fuck up, Danielle.  So she remakes the appointment for Saturday.  Who the fuck wants to go to therapy on a Saturday at one o' fucking clock?  What a fucking mood killer.

Regardless, I had plans, so I told her to call back and fix it or, since I'll do anything to get my ass out of therapy, that she could always just not make me go.

Alas.  No such luck.  Of course, a fight broke out.  What else would happen with me and my mother in the same room for more than four minutes at a time?

After much yelling and swearing, I called Steph, who clearly hates when I pull shit like this with her, but oh fucking well because I can't help it, to ask when the concert was supposed to be.  She told me that we weren't going anymore because it's 'way out in lincoln park' (Lincoln Park is far away?).  She then told me that she had a call on the other line (a.k.a. she didn't want to listen to my mom and I yelling back and forth.  who could blame her?) and we hung up.

So NOW I'm stuck in a stuffy office for an hour of my life, on a Saturday, while I could, instead, be with my friends, who do not trigger my gag reflux whenever I see them.

Let me tell you what makes summer just a little bit less than amazing:

Being stuck in the house ALL OF THE TIME.

AAGH.

I'M GOING STIR CRAZY IN THIS PLACE.

What once was broken, now has begun to knit itself back together.

What once was thought to be the end, is now only what could be the beginning of something.  Anything at all.  Something I can hold on to.

What once was wonderful, once was terrible, now is free, and I refuse to put any more worry into it.  Let it be what it is, and I will embrace it wholeheartedly.

What once could have ruined me, now WILL ruin me, and nothing could bring me to a greater level of content and profound understanding of the way the world works.

What once tortured me, still makes me ache, but I have slowly begun the healing process.

What once made you all lose a bit more respect for me, will make you hate and despise me.  And if you choose to hate me, I hope to god you rot in hell, because none of this is anything you can change.  It is the inevitable.

You all should come hang out with me saturday at bishop park... because I'm awesome.  And I'm turning sixteen... and you love me?

Maybe?

Come anyways.

I have the taste of chemicals in my mouth.

Mmm hair dye.

Haha.  I've become a tricky little girl.  I am conniving, I am secretive, I am lying and I am growing to love it.

Why shouldn't I put him through his own bit of anguish?

He said I was a bitch, why shouldn't I make it the truth?

Let him get his hopes up.  Let me make a fool of him.

I hope he thinks I am in the palm of his fucking hand.

Because once he thinks that I am, it's all over.

I have won.

I swear I have.

When the time is right... it will take me a few simple easy moments at the keyboard and I will be back on top.

And I must admit I am sick that I let him touch me so intimately.  And I am sick at the fact that I know I will miss it.

But I am the only sane one, because I am the only one who had the sense to get rid of him.

That won't last too long, however, if I can help it.

Pay attention my love cause its over
At the tip of my tongue is the price you weren't willing to pay
Still this is something akin to a breakdown
And your impression of a woman supposed to be easy to see
That there'd be torn up photos and lonely nights
Cursing crying and drawn out fights
Make up sex and a brand new start
Broken promises for broken hearts

When you look back now was it special?
Or was it nothing but anecdote that you can tell now and then
I delude myself it was worth it
Even though from the beginning I could see exactly how it would end

That there'd be torn up photos and lonely nights
Cursing crying and drawn out fights
Make up sex and a brand new start
Broken promises for broken hearts
Torn up photos and lonely nights
Cursing crying and drawn out fights
Make up sex and a brand new start
Broken promises for broken hearts

I wanna wish you away, I wanna wish you away
I wanna wish you away, I wanna wish you away?
I wanna kiss you away

Torn up photos and lonely nights
Cursing crying and drawn out fights
Make up sex and a brand new start
Broken promises for broken hearts
P.S. Today I got a whip.

Okay, so... Maybe you were never worth it.

I have only one regret...

And that is one I will keep to myself.
I wish i knew how to avoid these situations.

I've got a damn good idea.  Let's uncomplicate things.

It seemed a lot easier in the beginning, don't you think?

Maybe it's just the title that's fucking us up.

How many times can you expect me to say that I'm sorry before I drown in my words?

Well, fuck you, I'm done being sorry.

Thoughts of John bother me.  I don't know what it is, but every time his face pops up in my mind, my stomach drops and my mind flutters and my heart stops moving all together.

It's a feeling that's somewhere between euphoria and anxiety.  

Right now, if I wasn't sitting down, I know I would fall.  

Shit.  I don't understand it.  I feel this way, like I'm about to be sick, whenever he isn't around, whenever I think about him... but when I see him it just all goes away and I'm just filled to the brim with affection.   It... makes no sense.

I'm sick of thinking.

I miss him.  I really really do.

I had him right there, all wrapped around me with his soft eyes and his warm hands and his cold lips.  Right there, smiling at me with his cute chapped lips and his adorable hair, kissing my nose and massaging my hand in his.

And even then I felt horrible because everytime our lips met my mind sent a jolt throughout my whole body that said, "Steph's here.  She's alone.  Steph's alone and feeling just the way you used to all the time.  You aren't even dating him."

Even then it was terribly hard to pull myself away and say, "Steph, are you okay? I love you, Stephie,   are you sure you're fine?  You positive?  ... Okay... You sure?  ..."

Eventually I gave up.  And he slipped away again.  Oh, well.  Whatever happens happens.  Roll with the fucking punches.

Name 5 of life's simple pleasures that you like most, then pick 5 people to do the same. Try to be original and creative and not to use things that someone else has already used. Tag 5 people on your list.

1. Sloshing through puddles on a muggy summer day.

 2. Lying in the dewey grass near the end of spring when the sun is lazy and watching the clouds roam the sky.

3. Playing around with my silly dog.

4. The calm of a movie theatre, just before the lights go completely down, when the screen is black. That infinate, profound moment where nothing is certain and everything is so surreal.

5. The point of a song where, after a two minute build up of pure human emotion, it climaxes and everything is right with the world.

Tagging...

Whoever feels like doing this.

I am finally at peace with whatever happens.  Fuck my eerily realistic horoscope.  Fuck my mind and my heart.  I am at peace with the fact that this, all of this needs to just run its course like it should.  I don't need to mess around with it.  I need to learn to roll with the punches that life throws at me.  So what if things don't always turn out how I'd planned?  Maybe that's just not how it was supposed to turn out.  I can deal with that, now.  I really can.

I hope that one day soon, all of you guys can, too.

All of you who read this... If you're feeling sad, used, misplaced, lonely, afraid, or just plain bad...

Wait until spring.  I've got this crazy feeling that that's when all of the new beginnings will begin to show up.

Until then, and even then, don't you, any of you, forget that there is always someone who loves you, whether you know it or not.  And know that whether or not I'm around, I always care.

I adore all of you.  Just keep it up...

<3

I remember when I used to pray every night.  I used to sit up and hold my tiny golden cross necklace between my hands and I would look at the ceiling and in my head I would say, "Dear God.  Or Jesus... Lord...?  Would you show me that you're there?"  And I would give him something to demonstrate his existance.  I would think, "Lord, make my mommy cough," or, "Lord?  Would you make me not have a nightmare tonight?"  And then I would, almost every night, almost fall asleep. I would jerk myself out of it at the last moment, though.  And I would stare up at the black ceiling, the tv playing in the living room, my mind buzzing, and I would put all of my energy into my hands, and I would squeeze my cross and think, "Lord, bless mommy and daddy and Busia and Busia and Uncle Eddie and Aunt Lisa and suzy and jenny and uncle jerry and uncle dan and curtis and uncle eugene and aunt terri and matt and aunt laurie and uncle chris and..." etc.  I would fall asleep with my cross wound up in my fingers, my hands clenched together, saying my prayers like a good little devout christian.

Every fucking night I would do that.  Some nights I would catch myself,  my hands slipping as I fell asleep and I would panic, clenching them back together, wide-eyed and frightened, not wanting to be smited, and I would focus my energy back to the cross and think, "I'm so sorry lord, I'm so so sorry.  I just wanted to say I love you and goodnight and amen... Amen."

I couldn't fall asleep unless I had done this.  Every night.  If I forgot I would pray for forgiveness for missing my prayers the night before.  But then, this was back when I was also in the habit of kissing my parents goodnight daily, as well.  It's something I grew out of.  I don't know if it is possible to actually grow out of a religion, but it seems I have.

I remember going to church every Sunday.  Getting dolled up, buckling my little mary janes and pulling on a cardigan, and sitting through the 45 minute service, my head nodding the entire time.  I remember being baptised.  I remember Father Jude holding me up, at age 7, and laughing at the audience of people.  I remember being so enamored with Christ and Jesus and Mary.  I remember saying my prayers every night.  And some sick twisted part of me misses that.  Some part of me, deep deep inside of my soul, misses being so innocent.  I miss having such strong faith to fall back on.  I miss being able to ask forgiveness for things that don't really need to be forgiven.

And then I lost my christianity.  I was so close to just being an atheist.  But I gathered it back up.  Not because I loved Jesus.  Not because I actually believed in the miracle of the lord.  But because I had seen the Exorcist and it had scared me silly.  I suppose i was just never so devout to begin with.

I had always been a little off.  I had always been into the pagan aspect of things.  Tarot and spellcasting and energy seemed so much more logical than a man walking on water and yes, the concept of christ is a lovely thing, but it's just as absurd as anything else.  What my problem is is that the people who find Christ to be so wonderful are actually terrible people.

Quick to condemn and quick to insult.  They believe that they are the only ones who are right about anything ever.  They believe that polytheistic religions are absurd.  That the concept of any other religion is ludicrious, without looking on their own.  Yeah, perhaps it's a little weird to think of gods dwelling among us, but isn't it also a little kooky to think that a man could bring the dead back to life and turn water into wine?  I have no problem with Christianity.  I still have beliefs that lie within it, as a matter of fact, but my problem is that Christians tend to be so closed minded.

My faith would probably still be fully lit if I hadn't grown up to have homosexual friends or if I had never grown up to be a tad kinky.  Everything is wrong in Christianity.

So that was a tangent I hadn't even meant to go off into.  This post was meant to simply say that Christmas no longer has anything to do with Christ.  Not only for me, but for most of the American population.

I am a selfish teenage girl.  I can easily admit that I did not think about Christ once while I was downloading music onto my new iPod.  I can also say that I did get kind of miffed at the fact that that was really the only gift I ended up recieving from anyone.  I can say without an ounce of guilt that I was pissed because my grandmother didn't call to wish me a fucking nice christmas.  Because Christmas is no longer about Jesus.

Jesus was the original idea for the holiday.  Yes, yes.  Let's celebrate the birth of our saviour.  But people stopped caring after the first thousand years.  Now it's a time to be with family and friends.  A time to show your appreciation for your kin and spend fucking money on them.  It is a time to be spoiled and selfish and it is a time to share.  But it is not a time to think about Jesus Christ Almighty.  Not anymore.

Sorry Christ-People.  You lose.  You lost a long time ago.  People might smile and sing 'Silent Night' but they sing it with thoughts of Santa and money in their heads and hearts. 

Christmas has been corrupted by money.  And I will be the first to say that I am perfectly fine with that.

What did all of you guys get for Christmas?  Tell, tell.

Merry Christmas, everyone!!!

TEN RANDOM THINGS ABOUT ME

10] i have recently fallen in love with mittens.
9] i believe in love at first sight a little too strongly.
8] i think too deeply into things... which always ends up hurting me, somehow.
7] i'm a smart person who never applies herself.
6] i'm vegetarian because everytime i pick up a burger, I think of a healthy cow being slaughtered.
5] i never eat a healthy breakfast.
4] i'd rather kill a human being than kill any animal.
3] i have a vague memory of something terrible happening to me, but I'm not sure if it is a real memory, or if it was just a dream. 
2] i hate being left out of anything.
1] i love the smell of pie or cookies baking.

NINE WAYS TO WIN MY HEART

9] say what you really want to say, no matter how obscene it may be.  chances are, I'll only smile and kiss you.
8] tell me a secret.
7] let me fall asleep in your arms.
6] play the 'dead game' or other kissing games with me.
5] surprise me.
4] play me your favorite song.
3] kiss me in the rain.
2] let me play with your hair/play with my hair.
1] go along with my stupid ideas, no matter how little sense they make, just because you know it will make me happy.

EIGHT WAYS TO PISS ME OFF

8] fuck with my friends/me
7] break my heart.
6] tell me a truth that i have been hiding from.
5] ignore me (especially in favor of someone i dislike)
4] take something i have pride in.
3] pick on the underdog while i'm around.
2] remind me of something i wanted to forget.
1] don't tell me why you're mad at me, or if you are.

SEVEN THINGS I BELIEVE

7] there is no such thing as perfection, except in the eyes of the imperfect.
6] never do something for the profit, do it because it is something you love.
5] never get your hopes up.
4] the grass will never be greener if you don't water it every once in a while.
3] life isn't worth living if you don't live for love.
2] just because you can't see it, or feel it, doesn't mean it isn't there.
1] good things come to those who wait

SIX THINGS I'M AFRAID OF

6] actually having one of my dreams come true.  i wouldn't know what to do with myself.
5] success.
4] making a bad decision that will never go away.
3] dying alone.
2] dying without being known.
1] being forgotten.

FIVE FAVORITE ITEMS IN MY ROOM

5] my computer.
4] guitar.
3] my posters and collages.
2] my dvd player.
1] my knitting..

FOUR THINGS I DO EVERYDAY

4] knit.
3] write
2] wish for things i can never have.
1] shower.

THREE THINGS I WISH I WAS

3] inspired.
2] a gangster.
1] more outspoken.

TWO PEOPLE THAT I MISS

2] pierce.
1] rachel.

ONE PERSON I WANT TO SEE RIGHT NOW

1] someone who doesn't want to see me.

I have a new romantic interest.  If you so choose you can go here and snoop around.  It should help you deduct the culprit.

I have finished A Clockwork Orange and I have decided that it is amazing.  All of you with attention spans, go grab a Nadsat glossary if you feel the need (I didn't) and go to it!  It's a wonderful read, and quite touching... in its own sort of manner.

I went to Renfest the other day.  I blew 165 dollars on an amazing new costume.  So far I only have the chemise (type thing) the bodice and a petticoat.  As time passes, however, I plan on knitting myself some slippers, buying a few more petticoats, some jewelery, and a few jingly things.  It will be marvelous.

I got ice shoved in my cleavage (YES!  I HAD CLEAVAGE!) by an old man.  And there were quite a few attractive young men out there, so... w00t for such.

I got spacers.

My mouth is in pain.

So, in other words, I'm off to go get painkillers.

Peace, lovelies,

Me

I am impatient. I want to go to college.

Now.

Where's the fast forward button when you need it?

 

 

I have a new romantic interest.  If you so choose you can go here and snoop around.  It should help you deduct the culprit.
